New Records: The Celtics tied an NBA record with 29 three-pointers made in the game
Key Match Events: The Celtics led by as many as 35 points before missing their last 13 three-point attempts
The crowd chanted 'Yankees Suck!' during the game
Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics celebrated Banner 18 by raising the championship banner before the game
The Knicks were expected to be a strong contender but struggled against the Celtics
Post-Match Reflections: Jalen Brunson scored 22 points for the Knicks but couldn't lead his team to victory
The Celtics' depth and three-point shooting were key factors in their win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was on opening night
The attendance at TD Garden was 19,156
The referees included Zach Zarba, Mark Lindsay, and Brandon Schwab
